item.title: Styles Are Important
item.description: I’ve been reviewing a lot of code from candidates for the company I work at and have been discussing about art with some friends. I started to think a lot how I consider code-style very important and a form of art when done correctly. Styling goes around organizing, writing correctly, naming correctly, documenting correctly. Is my belief good style comes with time, comes with experience. You won’t know right ahead what works and what not.
